channel.title: 667 How can i make curtains work?
channel.description: Hi everyone, Today, i tried to make the curtains @ bandit camp work, but for some reason they still dont work. Maybe i did something wrong? idk (kinda new to coding.) Could anyone help me solving this problem? Thanks, Kon

item.title: 667 How can i make curtains work?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“MrSnow1, post:5, topic:528174”]1529 - Curtain - The curtain is open.

The Curtain is an object.

Go to objectmanager.java

	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1529, PosX, PosY, -1, 10);//Curtain

Copy this and paste between the other c.getPA().checkObjectSpawns
the 1529 is your object id ( in this case the curtain )
To get PosX & PosY ( the positions ) , simply type ::mypos and there are the positions.
the -1 , you can change that to 1,2,-2,-1 to open it, north/east/south/west , and you dont change the 10.[/quote]
That is for a PI sir, he want’s it for a 667 server.

Read full topic
item.source: 667 How can i make curtains work?
